scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && node --env-file=config.env server.js" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && node --env-file=config.env server.js" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd server && node --env-file=config.env server.js" "cd client && npm run"
